goal.en: This course uses the seven chapters of Zhuangzi as the main content. Based on the development of contemporary psychology, it attempts to conduct a philosophical analysis and restoration of the meaning behind the metaphors of Zhuangzi‘s stories from the perspectives of Chinese body concepts and Confucianism and Taoism. Through classroom introduction, and multiple discussions, enabling students to gain a deeper understanding of the deep narrative structure of Zhuangzi’s text and its guiding features for contemporary minds.
goal.ch: 本課程以莊子七篇作為上課主要內容，就當代心理學之發展，試圖從中國身體觀及儒道工夫論角度，針對莊子故事隱喻背後的意涵進行哲學式的分析還原，透過課堂的導讀及多項討論，促使同學深入掌握莊子文本的深層論述結構及對當代心靈的指引特色。
